title: Kids Animal Pairs v1.0 [Android] [APK] [GAME]
description:
********** Kids Animal Pairs **********

Kids Animal Pairs is the best game in this genre!

In Kids Animal Pairs you match up 2 similar animal cards. Can you memorize the card pairs? Test and improve your kids memory!

* Kids Animal Pairs improves your kids memory.
* Kids Animal Pairs develepes your kids concentration.
* Kids Animal Pairs stimulates your kids recognition.
* Kids Animal Pairs helps your kids to remember images.
* Kids Animal Pairs helps parents to support their kids.
* Kids Animal Pairs support you to teach your kid animal names.
* Kids Animal Pairs makes use of real animal images.
* Kids Animal Pairs has more than 80 cute, high resolution images.
* Kids Animal Pairs is easy to use and easy to learn how to play.
* Kids Animal Pairs support you to teach animal names.

Play against a friend, play with your kids on one screen! Kids Animal Pairs supports 2 player multiplayer mode (planned).

Kids Animal Pairs difficulty levels:
* Easy: 3x4 card layout with 6 pairs
* Medium: 4x5 card layout with 10 pairs
* Hard: 5x6 card layout with 15 pairs

Are you ready to test your memory in this free game?
